Name: Coffee Pixes
About the game: Coffee Pixes is a relaxing puzzle game in which you place 'Pixes' on to the board in a row to clear them. The goal is to fill the lines from one side to the other. If you don't have anywhere to put, the game is over. Remove combinations of rows to get bonus points. Extra points are also given if black Pixes are removed. Features 15 Achievements 5 Unique Themes Leaderboards Simple Game Mechanics Windowed Mode
